strapiPost.title: Makers Markets Scheduled For April 30th
strapiPost.content:
Though it might not seem like it now, Spring is coming, and with it 2 events we're excited about:

  • Makers on Mount Sequoyah: The NWA’s Makers’ Market, organized by the NWA Makers Club, is scheduled for April 30th, 10a-4p. It will be at Mount Sequoyah in Fayetteville and feature dozens of local artists and crafters selling what they’ve made. 
  • Friends on 5th St: Additionally, the Fifth Market on 5th Street in Bentonville is scheduled for April 30th. Going into their 2nd year, Fifth Market will have live music, crafts, and bites courtesy of Fifth Pottery Studio, Airship Coffee, and CACHE team.

You may want to hold April 30 for a full day of local events.
